allow:
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ git commit -m "Cleanup: Remove unnecessary files and directories

Removed:
- .claude/ directory (Claude Code settings)
- utils/ directory (utility scripts)
- PROBLEM_DESCRIPTION.md (documentation)
- __pycache__/ directories (Python cache)
- *.pyc files (compiled Python files)
- logs/*.log files (log files)

Added:
- .gitignore file to prevent tracking of unnecessary files

Project now contains only essential source code and configuration files.")
